assetProfile.address2: Third Floor Guru Ravi Das Marg Kalkaji
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: COFORGE Limited provides information technology (IT) and IT enabled Services in Americas, India, Europe, the Middle East and Africa, and the Asia Pacific. The company offers Tron intelligent automation services, including business process automation, IT operations automation, robotic process automation, development automation, and cognitive services; and business process services, such as back office operations, contact center operations, KPO, process re-engineering, consulting, and automation. It also provides cyber security services comprising security controls and technology management, threat and vulnerability management, and security crisis and incident response services; data and analytics services that include machine learning, data management, data modernization, and data monetization services; and digital process transformation services. In addition, the company offers infrastructure management services, which comprise data center, DevOps and automation, digital workplace, IT operations management, and services management services; and digital services, including digital experience and integration services. Further, it provides application services, such as application management, quality engineering, business agility and simplification, and salesforce services; and cloud services comprising cloud advisory, migration, operation, management, security, and testing services, as well as CloudPixy, a multi-cloud provisioning and orchestration solution. The company serves the travel and transportation, insurance, banking and financial services, enterprise services, manufacturing, media, and other industries. The company was formerly known as NIIT Technologies Limited and changed its name to COFORGE Limited in August 2020. COFORGE Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is based in New Delhi, India.
